title: 19: S3E19 –"Science Friction" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you four terrifying tales from authors the Dead Canary, Nathaniel Lewis, Caleb Wilson, and David Clark, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about creepy cults, sinister science, occult experiments, and cosmic calamity. See full episode details, including the text of the featured stories, here: https://www.simplyscarypodcast.com/series/scary-stories-told-in-the-dark/s3e19
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
